overview: Live recording of the recital that the band gave on September 11, 2010 at Luna Park Stadium. After touring the stages of Argentina for more than 21 years and establishing itself as an undisputed benchmark of national rock, the band played for the first time in the emblematic stadium and the official presentation of their album DESPIERTA served as an excuse so that throughout 3 hours, they gave an emotional, vibrant and intense show in which they covered the entire musical history of the band.
title: Las Pelotas - Vivo
